help-file.title: "DRAGON"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: N/A Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
When cast, "Dragon" creates a illusionary red dragon that attacks the victim. The illusion will end when the victim or caster dies or the duration of the spell ends. The illusion will also end after it has taken enough damage. If the victim try s to flee the area the dragon will attempt to hunt them down!
